title: EcoFlow Powers Up for Amazon's Prime Big Deals Day with Unbeatable Savings - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow is offering exclusive deals on its best-selling portable power stations and eco-friendly energy solutions from Oct. 1 to 15, featuring discounts on various products including DELTA Pro, DELTA 2, and DELTA 2 Max. Customers can also enjoy special offers on smart devices like WAVE 2 and GLACIER. Flash sales will be available on specific dates, and all deals can be accessed through the EcoFlow website and Amazon Store.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 (All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing), 335932 (Battery Manufacturing), 335313 (Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing), 335312 (Motor and Generator Manufacturing)
